pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Stochastic Linear Ornstein-Uhlenbeck Models for Phylogenetic Comparative Hypotheses // Fits multivariate Ornstein-Uhlenbeck types of models to continues trait data from species related by a common evolutionary history. See K. Bartoszek, J, Pienaar, P. Mostad, S. Andersson, T. F. Hansen (2012) doi:10.1016/j.jtbi.2012.08.005 and K. Bartoszek, and J. Tredgett Clarke, J. Fuentes-Gonzalez, V. Mitov, J. Pienaar, M. Piwczynski, R. Puchalka, K. Spalik, K. L. Voje (2024) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.14376. The suggested PCMBaseCpp package (which significantly speeds up the likelihood calculations) can be obtained from https://github.com/venelin/PCMBaseCpp/.
